title: [Question] All the laptop related work for CSE/ CSE AIML will be inside the classroom or will it be in the computer lab? Classroom doesn't have power outlets so laptop battery won't last long inside the classroom, does the labs have power outlets in F block of RR campus?

comments.body: Yes they have power outlets or you can use the systems in the lab as well
Ok but, do we need to use the laptop in the classroom?
In first year, you will be using laptops for lab only; For classes it is rarely used in first year
only for C / Python (if prof allows) and for matlab you'll be using laptops in classroom
